results.title: Biden had received a second booster. Here’s why it wasn’t enough to prevent infection.
results.abstract: The Omicron variant is evolving in ways that make it better able to evade the body’s immune defenses. But booster shots still help prevent severe illness.

results.title: The Jan. 6 Panel After 8 Hearings: Where Will the Evidence Lead?
results.abstract: The House committee has set out a comprehensive narrative of the effort to overturn the 2020 election. But it’s unclear if that will be enough to achieve its legal and political goals.

results.title: What to Know About the Marburg Virus Disease
results.abstract: Two people infected with the virus died in Ghana last month, though no other cases were found, experts said. The disease’s fatality rate is high.

results.title: When a Woman’s Retirement Account Becomes the Family Emergency Fund
results.abstract: Women break into their savings to cover all kinds of expenses: home down payments, repairs, medical bills. That can hurt them years later.
